plot outline: Dry Day, a commercial Marathi film displays a story of college going teenagers and relates to teen life experience that involves love life, breakup, friendship and a lot of spice which one can experience throughout the movie. Ritwikk Kendre and Monalisa Bagal serving as the excellent Star leads with Kailash Waghmare, Chinmay Kambali, Ayli Ghiya, Parth Ghadage and Arun Nalawade in their supporting roles.
title: Dry day
plot: The film revolves around three friends and their exploits on a dry day after one of them breaks up with his girlfriend.

Dry Day, a commercial Marathi film displays a story of college going teenagers and relates to teen life experience that involves love life, breakup, friendship and a lot of spice which one can experience throughout the movie. Ritwikk Kendre and Monalisa Bagal serving as the excellent Star leads with Kailash Waghmare, Chinmay Kambali, Ayli Ghiya, Parth Ghadage and Arun Nalawade in their supporting roles.
